tweets.text: @Vig79 @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency @riverlevel_2135 @Merton_Council Please call the @EnvAgencySE on 0800 80 70 60 as soon as you see anything like this. This kind of pollution is not allowed and must be reported. Thank you!
@Vig79 @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency @riverlevel_2135 @Merton_Council Do report any pollution incidents (and share photos and videos) to @EnvAgencySE on 0800 807060 so we can keep the Wandle running clear

@Vig79 @MertonMatters @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency @riverlevel_2135 @Merton_Council How can this be allowed? Shouldn't be happening. Need the water authorities and @Merton_Council  to get on to this now.

tweets.text:
Rather curiously there hasn't been a single Tweet from the @EnvAgency in the last 24 hours bragging about how they 'Enhance", the environment.

https://t.co/WaaFQXr1lZ

#stopthestink Smell is reaching Keele village and @KeeleUniversity. Must be much worse nearer the dump. Totally unacceptable. Do something please @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA # https://t.co/cVozfx2Yyq

How shocking is this ???
It is SHOCKING, yet it has become the NORM for STink postcodes !
The history books will blame and SHAME @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK @JamesBevanEA @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock https://t.co/NU7egDwQjW

tweets.text: Seriously @BBCPanorama you need to investigate @EnvAgency for failing to protect the most vulnerable from @RedIndustries2‚Äôs uncontrolled Walley‚Äôs Quarry Landfill in our town. There‚Äôs no gas control, It‚Äôs an emergency! #Panorama https://t.co/7wc6WL56HD

tweets.text: I don‚Äôt need a PhD in @PHE_EoEngland or environmental health @EnvAgency to know that monstrosity is not safe near houses - negligent & criminal if you to leave us suffering like this @BBCPanorama @StinkStopthe #Panorama https://t.co/rIdV099rzQ

tweets.text: Am I missing something here, how can regulatory bodies decline to be interviewed about companies breaking the law?? @EnvAgency @NatResWales  @Feargal_Sharkey @RiverActionUK  @wrurestore
@RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency having to stop the kids from playing outside with the dog because the smell coming from walleys landfill #StopTheStink stop ignoring an entire borough you pricks.

On the infamous big weekend stink of @RedIndustries2 Walley‚Äôs Quarry,the @EnvAgencyMids received thousands of complaints to their emergency number. No one came out and no data was collected.That tells you everything you need to know about the effectiveness of the EA.#stopthestink https://t.co/Tc3t6CrWb9

Elmbridge Borough Council will shortly be making a planning decision - either to allow a developer to put a road through the land, or save the view of Hampton Court Info @HCRCMary Att. @Dr_Ellie @sandralaville @BBCr4today @loisrogersnews  @ElmbridgeNews @MoleseySteve @surreylive https://t.co/arEsvdklhT

@Vig79 @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency @riverlevel_2135 @Merton_Council We look forward with interest to the classification and action from the @EnvAgency . Cat 3 or 4 and NFA or a warning after they have finished polluting is my guess and will be delighted to be wrong.

A bit of #TLC in Rossendale. This footage (from January) shows leaky stone dams slowing the flow of water from the moors into the River Irwell. We worked with @EnvAgencyNW @NTGawthorpe @DefraGovUK @unitedutilities to build 400 dams on Holcombe Moor and Musden Head Moor #NFM https://t.co/dOGdePZDqD

The fumes in the Westlands this morning outside are oft the scale,can‚Äôt believe how bad they are. Will have to leave the area for my 3 year old to get fresh air for him today, how can I stick to lockdown rules @MattHancock ? The @EnvAgency ‚Äòs negligence is making this impossible

tweets.text: @Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency Great shame a so many of the water industry staff really are passionate about doing a good job. The companies? Just look at the evidence, unless that passion arrived this week after years of contempt for the environment.

@Kimberl60072209 @SoTCityCouncil @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL Thank you üôè We are 2 miles away and never had it til a few months ago, now suffering health effects 4-5 nights per week, it‚Äôs getting worse and will pull in more areas and people if they don‚Äôt put a stop to it very soon

@SoTCityCouncil online pollution form doesn't seem to be working. Foul gases from Walleys quarry rife and entering house 6 miles from site. We need to support our NUL neighbours @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL #stopthestink

Toxic landfill gas from @RedIndustries2 walley's site surrounding my daughter's nursery in the Westlands this morning. She shouldn't have to breathe this air, please help us @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids üôè #stopthestink

@killicktom @MertonMatters @EnvAgency @pippamaslin @MarkGale @harryhpalmer @MitchamCrktGrn @MitchamSociety @Merton_Council @MartinWhelton Yes come on @MartinWhelton you profess to be so concerned about local pollution
@Vig79 @Matthew_Wright @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency @riverlevel_2135 @Merton_Council @S_Hammond @Merton_Council FYI
